alert.note: Alert for Benton; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:01PM CDT until May 15 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL BENTON...NORTHWESTERN MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 101 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cave Springs to 4 miles north of War Eagle, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Tontitown... Gravette... Cave Springs... Highfill... Gateway... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Hiwasse... Hobbs State Park... War Eagle... Miller... Centerton... Elm Springs... Avoca... Beaver Lake... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 72 and 93. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
